channel.title: BM vs. HL1 Comparison
channel.description:
I checked out youtube and found out that pretty much all the comparisons on youtube compared the first 2 chapters.
I wanted to change that, providing an actual proper video comparison :freeman: (Sorry about the slight stutter and one clip being corrupt, damn sony vegas)
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fU06wKaspUU[/url]

item.title: BM vs. HL1 Comparison
item.dc:creator: raiseer
item.description:
Thanks for the video. It’s a great tool to show your friends, why they should checkout BM.
Btw: Did anyone try to make a HL1-remake of the Black Mesa trailer? I’d really like to see that

Read full topic

item.title: BM vs. HL1 Comparison
item.dc:creator: Gedesnegl
item.description:
I think i’d prefer BM, since the storyline goes more smoothly with HL2 now that we see Eli and Kleiner. But the mood just isn’t the same. and it will never be.
Also i find the voice acting to sometimes make conversations kind of awkward/Boring compared to HL1, at other times it’s just twice as awesome.

Read full topic

item.title: BM vs. HL1 Comparison
item.dc:creator: deadlife101
item.description:
Black Mesa is better. Nuff said.

Read full topic

item.title: BM vs. HL1 Comparison
item.dc:creator: Excel
item.description:
while 10+ years of graphics improvements have certainly shown HL1s age
There is no substitute for the original…HL1 still rules over BM in my eyes.

Read full topic

item.title: BM vs. HL1 Comparison

item.description:

Hmmm… Half-Life has better graphics.

Yeah it does, BM is such a shoddy remake.
